abstract: RIM's new name for its operating system, BBX, is similar to another company's software's name, BBx.
snippet: RIM's new name for its operating system, BBX, is similar to another company's software's name, BBx.
lead_paragraph: OTTAWA--While Research in Motion disappointed many analysts this week by offering relatively little specific or new information about the next generation of BlackBerry phones, it did make one announcement at a software conference. The new operating system for those phones will be named BBX.
